info.author: Santiago Pestarini
info.description:
csrs_ppp command
================

Send RINEX observation file to **NRCan CSRS-PPP Service**, save results to a given directory and/or send it to a given e-mail.

Requirements
============

- Python v3.6.x or higher (https://www.python.org/)
- Click v7 or higher (https://click.palletsprojects.com/)
- Requests library, v2.18.1 or higher (http://docs.python-requests.org/en/master/)
- Requests Toolbelt library, v0.8.0 or higher (https://toolbelt.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)

Usage
=====

``csrs_ppp [OPTIONS] RINEX``

Argument
--------

:``RINEX``: path of RINEX file

It may be **RINEX** (``.yyo``), **CRINEX**/**Hatanaka** (``.yyd``) or any of that compressed by **gzip**, **zip** or **UNIX compress** (``.gz``, ``.zip``, ``.Z``).

Options
-------

-u, --user-name TEXT        Registered user name (email)  [required]
-e, --email TEXT            E-mail where to send the results
--results-dir PATH          Path to results directory  [default: .]
--lang <en|fr>              Language  [default: en]
--mode <static|kinematic>   Processing mode  [default: static]
--ref <NAD83|ITRF>          Reference frame  [default: NAD83]
--epoch <yyyy-mm-dd>        NAD83 epoch [default: CURRENT]
--vdatum <CGVD2013|CGVD28>  Vertical datum  [default: CGVD2013]
--get-max INTEGER           Number of 10-second intervals to wait for results  [default: 30]

Flags
-----

--version                   Show the version and exit.
--web                       Visit CSRS-PPP website  [default: False]
--help                      Show this message and exit.

Recomendations
==============

:Repeated timeouts: If you find that it keeps timing out, try increasing the value of ``--get_max``.

:Website access: Use ``--web`` command line flag to visit CSRS-PPP website (through default web browser).

LICENSE
=======

Use of Canadian Geodetic Survey products and data is subject to the `Open Government Licence - Canada
<https://open.canada.ca/en/open-government-licence-canada>`_.
